txt.en: 'The Orcs are coming to test us once again! Prepare for battle!'
The Elves have suffered too many casualties! ([placeholder]/12)
You failed to report back in to Raingon!
The Orcs in Fanuidhol have been launching frequent small-scale attacks against the borders of LÃ³rien to test and weaken the resolve of the defenders before they launch a major assault.

'You have come none too soon, [placeholder]. The Orcs have been launching small assaults against us of late, and our scouts have seen another raiding party heading this way.\n\n'I need you at the base of these telain to help our soldiers on the ground drive off the Orcs with minimal casualties. We cannot afford to lose any more of our people, or we will be left shorthanded when their true assaults begin.'
Raingon is at Talan Gwilith.\n\nYou should speak with Raingon to prepare the defences for battle.
'The Orcs come even now! Prepare our defences and reinforce our guards where you may! The Orcs will attack both here and at Talan Fanuidhol!'
Raingon has asked you to defeat the attackers out of Fanuidhol at both Talan Gwilith and Talan Fanuidhol, while protecting the Elven soldiers.
Raingon is at Talan Gwilith.\n\nWith the assault turned aside, you should speak with Raingon.
'The marchwardens tell me that you have acquitted yourself well during the recent skirmish. Allow me to offer you a token of our appreciation.''
Talk to Raingon at Talan Gwilith
Talk to Raingon at Talan Gwilith
